entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 20 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
